# freeipa_sudo_rule_option (Resource)

## Example Usage
```hcl
resource freeipa_sudo_rule_option "option-0" {
  name = "sudo-rule-test"
  option = "!authenticate"
}

```

### Required

- `name` (String) Sudo rule name
- `option` (String) Sudo option to add to the sudo rule.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
